title: Big Dogs Little Dogs: On The Farm (Wild Acres Farm Series, #4).
description: BIG DOGS LITTLE DOGS: ON THE FARM gives the beginner reader a glimpse into the life of the Komondor livestock guardian dogs and their puppies. With vivid photos, familiar words, a picture dictionary and science facts this book is perfect for shared reading and emergent reader success."I would highly recommend this book for early learners, as a teaching tool in classrooms, and I would also recommend it for anybody trying to learn English as a second language." Books Children Read
author: Carolyn  Wild
